title: Play It Again II: Games Collection
brief_description:
The Play It Again II project aims to document, preserve, and create an accessible and playable history of Australasian videogames and videogame culture from the 1990’s.

This collection comprises physical games and hardware donated to ACMI for the project and as well as game emulation files created by ACMI or harvested from external web repositories.

The project is being undertaken by ACMI in partnership with Flinders University, University of Melbourne, The New Zealand Film Archive, Berlin Computerspiele Museum, and the Research Trust of Victoria University of Wellington. Funding comes from the Australian Research Council (ARC) Linkage Projects scheme, which funds collaborative projects between University researchers and Partner Organisations. Play It Again II is a continuation of Play It Again I, which focused on preserving Australasian videogames from the 1980’s.

group_works.title: Flight of the Amazon Queen [DOS]
group_works.material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM, CD jewel case with insert, manual, registration card and installation guide in cardboard box

group_works.title: Gumboots Australia [PC]
group_works.material_description: Floppy disk videogame. One 3 1/2 inch floppy disk and manual in cardboard box

group_works.title: Powerslide [PC]
group_works.material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM in CD jewel case with insert and manual

group_works.title: Shadowrun [SNES]
group_works.creator_credit: Data East USA and Beam Software
group_works.material_description: Cartidge videogame. Cartridge, reference sheet and manual in cardboard box

group_works.title: The Dame Was Loaded [DOS]
group_works.creator_credit: Philips Interactive Media, Inc. and Beam Software
group_works.material_description: CD-ROM videogame. Two CD-ROM, CD case insert and manual in 2 CD capacity jewel case

production_dates.notes: Games in this Collection date from the 1990s. The ARC research project "Play It Again" (II) will be completed in 2022.
